coreAttributes.name: lip ring
coreAttributes.description: A pair of thin rings, intended to be worn in a person's lip piercings.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the pair of rings into [npc.her] [npc.lip] piercing.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the pair of rings into [npc2.namePos] [npc2.lip] piercing.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(slide)] the pair of rings into [npc2.namePos] [npc2.lip] piercing.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] [npc.her] pair of rings out of [npc.her] [npc.lip] piercing.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] [npc2.namePos] pair of rings out of [npc2.her] [npc2.lip] piercing.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] pair of rings out of [npc2.her] [npc2.lip] piercing.
